channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FEMA Director Says Criticism Of Agency Is Misinformation

item.title: The Senate Should Assert Its Power to Block Bad Nominees
item.description: Trump’s nascent battle to undermine the power of the Senate is ultimately being waged in behalf of a false premise.

item.title: California voters reject measure that would have raised minimum wage to nation-high $18 per hour
item.description: Voters in California have rejected a ballot measure that would have raised the state minimum wage to $18 per hour by 2026, the highest in the country.

item.title: ‘We Firmly Support Him’: Conservative Thought Leaders Endorse Gaetz’s AG Nomination
item.description: Some of the conservative movement's biggest names endorsed Matt Gaetz to become America's next attorney general on Tuesday.

item.title: There’s No Such Thing as ‘Having It All’
item.description: A new report suggests major corporations view maximum flexibility as the most pro-woman benefits policy.

item.title: Trump picks Linda McMahon for education secretary
item.description: President-elect Donald Trump announced Tuesday that he had selected his transition co-chair Linda McMahon to serve as education secretary.

item.title: Speaker Mike Johnson’s Response To The Trans Bathroom Fracas In Congress Was Cowardly
item.description: This shouldn’t be hard or need any clarification. Rep. McBride is a man, and Johnson should have said so plainly.

item.title: Bob Casey Files More Ridiculous Lawsuits In Search Of Additional Votes
item.description: Why is Casey bothering to fight for so few votes? Is it to test the courts or set legal precedent for future elections?

item.title: Unsanction Israel
item.description: Biden’s anti-Israel sanctions regime violates several standards of sanctions policy and threatens speech rights of Americans and in other democracies.

item.title: Hacker obtains House ethics testimony on Matt Gaetz as Trump makes calls for AG nominee
item.description: An unidentified hacker has reportedly obtained a file that contains confidential testimony involving allegations of sexual misconduct by Matt Gaetz.

item.title: Michigan Senate Democrats Push To Ban Unapproved Election Speech
item.description: Michigan Senate Democrats are trying to ban making a 'false statement or misrepresentation' about elections.
